values: Dude, I want a button maker. It's my new goal. I'm saving for one. They're like, what. $70? Also, how fun would most of those old stick!lj icons look on a pin? Aside from the fact that, you know. They'd all have to be resized and stuff. Wahahaha. Or maybe Katie and I are the only ones amused by pins. [whistles]
Woo! More coming as soon as I get un-lazy. Will possibly stick old icons over here to fill time until the grammys. [twitch]
